Title: Ang pamilyang hindi lumuluha
Actors: Sharon Cuneta, NiÃ±o Muhlach, Moi Marcampo, Cris Villanueva
Plot: A lonesome and alcoholic woman attempts to fulfill a local legend about the Family That Doesn't Weep with the help of her nanny and her nanny's uncle in the hopes of reuniting her own estranged family.
